text:
Hi to all, i'm using 2.0.49 with mod_speling to emulate a case-insensitive 
webserver. everything works fine except to directory names: when trying to 
access "ite" dir, it hangs with a segmentation fault (signal 11) child exit.
in the same root dir of "ite" it exist several directory of 3-digits starting 
with "i" (ie. "inf" or "ing")
is this a bug or what?
thanks in advance
--
matteo
creator: matteo@rmnet.it

text:
Sorry, I cannot reproduce the problem.
Can you please more explain, what your exact configuration is, what the request
and if it really only happens if mod_speling is active,

A backtrace would be nice as well ;-)

Thanks.
creator: nd@perlig.de
